long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IguanaMark is an intelligent reading list that makes link organization effortless.

Have you ever felt annoyed while managing your bookmarks in Chrome? IguanaMark will improve your day-to-day interactions with your browser by intelligently organizing your bookmarks.

Features:
 - Organize your reading list with tags
 - IguanaMark automatically learns to tag your bookmarks
 - Quickly bookmark pages from the page itself
